flow.descriptionCdata:
d09d392c-f721-4902-9477-49cdc932ac8a.01d196fb-2e64-4942-9a49-98ed284a51dc.prompt=Enter a value for list d09d392c-f721-4902-9477-49cdc932ac8a.29a4564d-357c-48d0-8709-048c65967d3a.prompt=Process Instance ID d09d392c-f721-4902-9477-49cdc932ac8a.35f88336-f0d8-4096-94d8-d028e5633af3.prompt=User Identifier d09d392c-f721-4902-9477-49cdc932ac8a.369776cc-3736-4bd9-8101-0e2460a50cc8.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State d09d392c-f721-4902-9477-49cdc932ac8a.3c830d0a-ccdf-48dc-b6a2-b7aa3089e4dc.prompt=Enter a value for index d09d392c-f721-4902-9477-49cdc932ac8a.3f86ea01-e28c-4ac3-8848-6e9281efbaea.prompt=Process Instance ID d09d392c-f721-4902-9477-49cdc932ac8a.3ffb29f6-4578-4635-af6c-3601a547ae05.description=
Retrieves a value from a list.

Inputs\:
list - A list to get the value from.
delimiter - the delimiter that separates values in the list.
index - the index of the value (Starting at 0) to retrieve from the list, or end for the last element, or end-1 for the second to last element.

Responses\:
success - The operation completed successfully.
failure - Something went wrong.

Returns\:
The value read from the list.
d09d392c-f721-4902-9477-49cdc932ac8a.55e91dd6-583c-4ca3-97e5-b4198fe6a7e4.prompt=User Identifier d09d392c-f721-4902-9477-49cdc932ac8a.5d3161d4-0331-4658-9778-41084ad07c82.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State d09d392c-f721-4902-9477-49cdc932ac8a.5ee8b91e-8e59-467e-8729-ea847e4a9f8c.prompt=Process Instance ID d09d392c-f721-4902-9477-49cdc932ac8a.6ef46e26-e3d2-4e5f-8f2f-490cb05cb6a7.description=
Adds a flow variable into the local context (available to itself and child flows only)

Input Parameters\:
keyName - the name of the flow variable to use
myValue - the value to assign the flow variable

Responses\:
success - assigned the flow variable

Scriptlet Example\:
[$scriptletContext putGlobal\: $keyName, $myValue];
d09d392c-f721-4902-9477-49cdc932ac8a.7731b80e-ec14-4826-9944-0a524b5d53ad.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State d09d392c-f721-4902-9477-49cdc932ac8a.825031ed-7543-4ab7-9886-2b24a252500d.description=
Checks if a number or word is greater than another number or word. Word comparison is case-sensitive in alphabetical order.

Inputs\:
value1 - The first value.
value2 - The second value.

Returns\:
value1 > value2

Responses\:
success - The boolean operation was evaluated to true.
failure - Something went wrong or the boolean operation returned false.
d09d392c-f721-4902-9477-49cdc932ac8a.b12c893d-28fa-4f05-83e3-7f4284288735.description=
Subtracts two numbers

Inputs\:
value1 - The first value.
value2 - The second value.

Returns\:
The difference of the two numbers.

Responses\:
success - The operation completed successfully.
failure - Something went wrong.
d09d392c-f721-4902-9477-49cdc932ac8a.b1f7e207-092c-4235-9f87-831293a8ac9f.prompt=Enter list of values separated by delimiter\: d09d392c-f721-4902-9477-49cdc932ac8a.b26ca7ef-aacc-4fc8-96ba-3e9e398f15d6.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State d09d392c-f721-4902-9477-49cdc932ac8a.ca17e523-2cd5-4016-bae7-7412e11f3078.prompt=Enter a value for value1 d09d392c-f721-4902-9477-49cdc932ac8a.d0adc837-513d-46f3-a106-222274ddedb2.description=
Generates a random number.

Inputs\:
max - The maximum number that can be returned.
min - The minimum number that can be returned.

Responses\:
success - The operation completed Successfully.
failure - Something went wrong.

Returns\:
A random number between max and min (inclusive)
d09d392c-f721-4902-9477-49cdc932ac8a.d995cfc1-985a-488c-a006-b01b8121e45c.description=
Returns the length of the list.

Inputs\:
delimiter - The list delimiter.
list - The list to be processed

Responses\:
success - The operation completed Successfully.
failure - Something went wrong.

Returns\:
The length of the list.
d09d392c-f721-4902-9477-49cdc932ac8a.dea1a228-7073-479f-a0a8-8322b080cb1d.prompt=User Identifier d09d392c-f721-4902-9477-49cdc932ac8a.description=
Remove a Server from the Server Group. Random Server will be selected from the Server Group.

Inputs Parameters\:

 CSA_CONTEXT_ID – CSA Context Id
 CSA_PROCESS_ID – CSA Process Instance Id
 SVC_COMPONENT_ID - This token will resolve to the Service component Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\:SVC_COMPONENT_ID]
 RSC_PROVIDER_ID - This token will resolve to the Resource Provider Id that was selected at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\:RSC_PROVIDER_ID]
 SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_EMAIL - This token will resolve to the subscriber’s email address. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_EMAIL]
 RSC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID - This token will resolve to the Resource Subscription Id that was created from the Resource Offering at the Subscription time.
  		Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID]
 SVC_COMPONENT_TYPE - This token will resolve to the Service component type. Eg\: Server.. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_COMPONENT_TYPE]
 RSC_POOL_ID - This token will resolve to the Resource pool Id that was selected at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_POOL_ID]
 SVC_INSTANCE_ID - This token will resolve to the Service Instance Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_INSTANCE_ID]
 SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID - This token will resolve to the Subscription Id that was created at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID]
 PRN_COMPONENT_ID – This token will resolve to the parent Component’s Service Component Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: PRN_COMPONENT_ID]
 REQ_ORG_ID - This token will resolve to the Organization Id associated with the service request. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: REQ_ORG_ID]
 REQ_USER_ID - This token will resolve to the User Id associated with the service request. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: REQ_USER_ID]
 USR_ORG_ID - This token will resolve to the Organization Id associated with the subscriber. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: USR_ORG_ID]
 RSC_BINDING_ID - This token will resolve to the Resource Binding Id that was created at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_BINDING_ID]

Responses\:
 success - The operation completed successfully.
 failure - Something went wrong.
d09d392c-f721-4902-9477-49cdc932ac8a.e8004ce6-a4fc-4a63-a5a2-d872576dad0e.prompt=Enter a value for value1 d09d392c-f721-4902-9477-49cdc932ac8a.ee24db60-077e-4c2d-a1de-2982a5809e8c.prompt=User Identifier d09d392c-f721-4902-9477-49cdc932ac8a.f60b544b-1914-4583-b60b-ca82065b56a1.prompt=Process Instance ID
flow.name: vCenter Simple Compute - Server Group Flex-in Server

staticBinding.value: Cannot remove server. Server group has reached minimum server count
Instance has been removed from your subscription ${subscriptionName}

Greetings,
The email confirms that the following server instance has been removed successfully.
Server Group : ${serverGroupname} Server : ${hostname}
For help and support, please visit HP CSA Consumer portal.
Sincerely, HP CSA Team
Removing server from the server group
